name: midnight-light
description: Midnight Light is a modern personal Web front-end.

scripts.test: npm run setup && gulp && git status | grep 'working directory clean' >/dev/null || (echo 'Please commit all changes generated by building'; exit 1)
scripts.serve: nodemon --watch gulpfile.js --watch gulpfile.babel.js --watch package.json --watch .jshintrc --watch .jscsrc --watch tsconfig.json --watch tsd.json --watch tslint.json --watch jspm.conf.js --exec gulp serve
scripts.serve-dist: nodemon --watch gulpfile.js --watch gulpfile.babel.js --watch package.json --watch .jshintrc --watch .jscsrc --watch tsconfig.json --watch tsd.json --watch tslint.json --watch jspm.conf.js --exec gulp serve-dist
scripts.update: npm install --no-optional && jspm update && jspm dl-loader
scripts.setup: npm install --global gulp babel tsd jspm --no-optional && npm install --no-optional && jspm install && npm run tsd
